summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of California Avenue from West Brandon Street to West Graham Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing necessary approaches, providing for the necessary surface drainage and readjustment of existing concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 40228; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
